Ayah Asmidar pula menyuruhnya berkahwin bersama Jeff - namun setelah beberapa bulan mereka pun bercerai kerana tidak bahagia. Ali dan Asmidar pun bersatu semula.

programme.title: Cinta Tak Semudah Dot Com
programme.desc: Seorang ejen hartanah lelaki muda yang miskin telah menyamar sebagai tuan punya sebuah banglo kepada seorang pelanggan wanita yang cantik dan diingati kaya tetapi mempunyai musilhat. Wanita tersebut yang merupakan seorang penjual kosmetik tiruan telah menyamar sebagai seorang wanita kaya dengan tujuan untuk mencari dan berkahwin dengan lelaki kaya.

programme.title: Eva
programme.desc: Seorang wanita yang dari kecil mengimpikan mempunyai kuasa ajaib seperti di miliki sahabatnya . Berhadapan dengan berbagai masalah akibat dirinya yang sering menyendiri dan cuba mencari identiti dirinya sendiri . Akhirnya beliau menyedari bahawa kelebihan yang diharapkannya sesuatu yang bakal memakan dirinya sendiri

programme.title: Slank Nggak Ada Matinya
programme.desc: Abdee dan Ridho dipanggil oleh SLANK, sebuah band rock, untuk datang jamming dengan Bimbim dan Ivan. Ternyata, SLANK ingin membuktikan bahawa SLANK tidak bersurai walaupun personelnya hanya tinggal Bimbim, Kaka dan Ivan pergi jelajah. Abdee dan Ridho turut dijemput, dan diberi syarat untuk dapat membawakan 35 buah lagu SLANK dalam masa 3 hari sahaja. Lawatan di sekitar kawasan itu bermula, dan ketika itulah pengembaraan SLANK bermula dengan format baharu.

programme.title: Tmo Abang Saya Ustaz
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Abang Saya Ustaz

programme.title: Di Pintu Syurga
programme.desc: Jannah disuruh untuk bernikah dengan Faris oleh ibu bapanya. Faris adalah seorang guru seni khat. Suatu malam, Jannah terlibat dalam kemalangan yang mengakibatkan dia mengalami amnesia. Jannah jatuh cinta dengan Faris, yang dianggap sebagai seorang lelaki yang sempurna dan layak menjadi imamnya suatu hari nanti. Sikap Jannah juga sudah berubah. Namun, kebahagiaan yang dimiliki mereka tidak kekal lama.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep11
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Gila Gusti
programme.desc: Dua orang sahabat, Mamat dan Zul, obses terhadap gusti dan mengidolakan ahli gusti tempatan terkenal bernama Naga. Apabila Naga tewas dalam perlawanan besarnya dan patah semangat untuk terus bergusti, Mamat dan Zul nekad untuk membantu idola mereka mencari semula semangat yang hilang demi memenangi semua kejuaraan gusti Asia Pasifik.

programme.title: Cinta Kita
programme.desc: seorang gadis yang keciwa dalam percintaan alu mengubah wataknya menjadi seorang “tomboy” .Namun dia kembali kepada wanita semula setelah menemui cinta yang baru

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep3
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Tersuka Dia
programme.desc: seorang gadis jatuh hati kepada seorang pemuda tampan yang merupakan ketua pegawai eksekutif di syarikat miliknya . Gadis itu mula tertarik kepada pemuda ini setelah beliau bantu mengejar peragut beg tangannya . Pemuda itu turut jatuh hati terhadap si gadis yang pernah membulinya semasa di sekolah dahulu

programme.title: Tmo Gila Tak Cinta
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Gila Tak Cinta

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep12
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Seri dan Nasir adalah wartawan dan jurugambar yang gigih mencari scoop dalam liputan berita mereka. Selepas membuat scoop sindiket rokok di pulau pinang Nasir pulang ke Kuala Lumpur. Nasir terkejut apabila melihat isterinya sedang berasmara dengan lelaki lain di biliknya.

programme.title: Hello Itu Bff I
programme.desc: Selepas menamatkan pelajaran di luar negara, seorang wanita muda pulang ke tanah air dengan perasaan tidak sabar ingin bertemu bff tersayangnya. Namun kehadiran BFF baharu dalam kehidupan kawannya telah menimbulkan rasa cemburu dan bengang dalam dirinya. dia mencuba pelbagai helah untuk memisahkan mereka dan akibatnya berlaku pergaduhan antara dia dan sahabat baru kawannya

programme.title: Mama Oh Mama
programme.desc: Seorang perempuan yang berperwatakan liar sering melakukan perkara yang tidak dipersetujui oleh ibu bapanya . Dia sering mengunjungi kelab malam dan keluar bersama teman lelakinya . Walaupun dinasihati oleh orang gajinya, perempuan itu tetap tidak berubah sikap.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S12 Ep13
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep3
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Gina dan Jo yang bertemu secara tak sengaja dan berpakat untuk memastikan Hardy dan Nita tak jadi berkahwin dengan bantuan dua lagi rakan mereka iaitu Lola dan Tompy.

programme.title: Kanta Serigala
programme.desc: seorang abang yang cuba membalas dendam atas kematian adiknya. Adiknya seorang remaja berbakat berkeinginan untuk menjadi seorang penyanyi terkenal dan berpengaruh seperti penyanyi pujaannya telah menjadi mangsa penipuan, diperkosa dan dibunuh dua lelaki yang menyamar kakitangan syarikat rakam

programme.title: Gila Gusti
programme.desc: Dua orang sahabat, Mamat dan Zul, obses terhadap gusti dan mengidolakan ahli gusti tempatan terkenal bernama Naga. Apabila Naga tewas dalam perlawanan besarnya dan patah semangat untuk terus bergusti, Mamat dan Zul nekad untuk membantu idola mereka mencari semula semangat yang hilang demi memenangi semua kejuaraan gusti Asia Pasifik.

programme.title: Tmo Gila Tak Cinta
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Gila Tak Cinta

programme.title: Jodoh Express
programme.desc: Maya, seorang ketua agensi mencari jodoh yang berusaha menyatukan pelanggan-pelanggannya dengan gadis atau jejaka idaman mereka. Suatu hari, agensi mereka telah didatangi seorang pelanggan wanita, Ros yang ingin menggunakan perkhidmatan mereka untuk memikat seorang gadis bernama Qalisha untuk adik lelakinya, Akmal. Namun, tanpa disangka rupa-rupanya Akmal adalah lelaki yang disukai oleh Maya dalam diam.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep12
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Datin Glam
programme.desc: Kisah Nona yang ke Kuala Lumpur untuk menjaga sepupunya, Datin Ros yang sedang sakit tenat. Datin Ros berhajat untuk suaminya Datuk Kamal mengahwini Nona sekiranya dia tidak ada lagi.

programme.title: Merah
programme.desc: Tiga sahabat ini pada asalnya berkiblatkan pada kebenaran dan kesucian, tetapi atas cabaran suratan nasib, mereka berubah mengambil jalan singkat untuk mengubah hidup mereka . Mereka bertiga melakukan satu rompakan nekad untuk membantu nenek salleh yang terlantar di hospital, yang memerlukan wang yang banyak untuk mendapatkan rawatan pakar

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep4
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Anak Hoki
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki berjanji dengan teman wanitanya bahawa dia akan bersamanya pada hari lahirnya iaitu dua hari kemudian. Kemudian pada petang itu semasa berhenti untuk minum di sebuah bar, dia tersilap diculik kerana menyerupai anak seorang jutawan.

programme.title: Tmo Dari Kerana Mata
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Dari Kerana Mata

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep13
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Sikit Punya Gila
programme.desc: Berkisar tentang dua orang pemuda kampung berhijrah ke bandar untuk mencari kekayaan. Setelah beberapa lama berusaha mereka masih dibelegu dengan masalah kewangan. Oleh itu mereka mula terjebak dalam pelbagai kegiatan judi sebagai jalan mudah untuk cepat kaya.

programme.title: 12 Ghost Fingers
programme.desc: Chow terpaksa berpindah ke rumah datuknya selepas penceraian ibu bapanya. chow mendaftar kan diri di sekolah san min. pada hari pertamanya, rakan sekelasnya memberitahunya bahawa sekolah itu membentuk mata. semasa dalam perjalanan pulang dari sekolah, chow dpt rasakan ada sesuatu telah berlaku disekolah itu dan dia ingin menyiasat apa yang dirahsiakan oleh pihak sekolah selama ini.

programme.title: Slank Nggak Ada Matinya
programme.desc: Abdee dan Ridho dipanggil oleh SLANK, sebuah band rock, untuk datang jamming dengan Bimbim dan Ivan. Ternyata, SLANK ingin membuktikan bahawa SLANK tidak bersurai walaupun personelnya hanya tinggal Bimbim, Kaka dan Ivan pergi jelajah. Abdee dan Ridho turut dijemput, dan diberi syarat untuk dapat membawakan 35 buah lagu SLANK dalam masa 3 hari sahaja. Lawatan di sekitar kawasan itu bermula, dan ketika itulah pengembaraan SLANK bermula dengan format baharu.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S12 Ep14
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep4
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Maria Mariana 1
programme.desc: Dua beradik perempuan dibesarkan dalam sebuah keluarga, namun adik memiliki sikap negatif dan berprasangka tidak baik terhadap kasih sayang yang diberikan oleh kedua ibu bapanya dan merasakan ibu bapanya memberi kasih sayag yang lebih kepada kakaknya.

programme.title: Teacher Chan Ram
programme.desc: Chan Ram dibesarkan di sebuah kampung di mana ibu bapa sudah biasa menghantar anak perempuan mereka bekerja di Bangkok. Dia hanya tamat darjah 4 sahaja kerana tidak mampu untuk menyambung pelajaran. Bagaimanapun, dia membuka sekolah kecil untuk mengajar orang-orang bukit dengan sokongan ibu bapanya dan Siwapong rakan sekolahnya yang pulang ke kampung dan membantunya.

programme.title: Datin Glam
programme.desc: Kisah Nona yang ke Kuala Lumpur untuk menjaga sepupunya, Datin Ros yang sedang sakit tenat. Datin Ros berhajat untuk suaminya Datuk Kamal mengahwini Nona sekiranya dia tidak ada lagi.

programme.title: Tmo Dari Kerana Mata
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Dari Kerana Mata

programme.title: Ah How Putus Cinta
programme.desc: sepasang suami isteri yang membuka sebuah restoran makanan laut Cina halal dilanda masalah apabila ketua tukang masaknya menghilangkan diri selepas putus cinta dengan kekasihnya.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep13
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Gunting Bhavana
programme.desc: Bhavana seorang tukang jahit yang kehilangan gunting turun temurun. Ketika kehilangan gunting berlaku, kesemua anak menantunya berada dirumah. Disebabkan oleh itu, Bhavana menuduh mereka sehingga menyebabkan mereka merajuk dan kembali pulang ke Kuala Lumpur.

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Seri dan Nasir adalah wartawan dan jurugambar yang gigih mencari scoop dalam liputan berita mereka. Selepas membuat scoop sindiket rokok di pulau pinang Nasir pulang ke Kuala Lumpur. Nasir terkejut apabila melihat isterinya sedang berasmara dengan lelaki lain di biliknya.

programme.title: Doa Ibu Terzalimi Menuntun Anak Yang Lupa Diri Untuk Bertaubat
programme.desc: Puan Manik sudah tua dan tidak boleh lagi bekerja sebagai buruh di pasar. Anak lelaki Puan Manik, Andi, bekerja sebagai penunggang teksi motosikal. Namun, dia tidak meringankan kehidupan ibunya. Dia memaksa ibunya mencari lebih banyak wang supaya dia dapat memenuhi hasrat gaya hidup isterinya, Vita.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep52
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2021 Ep11
programme.desc: Kemeriahan pentas Indosiar tetap hadir dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia dalam rancangan Indosiar Semarak 2021. Iringi malam anda dengan persembahan yang menakjubkan daripada artis serta penyanyi dari ibu kota.

programme.title: Cinta Misteri Ep38
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep40
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep85
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Anak Buta Mata Yang Menjadi Satu-Satunya Permata Dalam Keluarga
programme.desc: Mima, anak berkeperluan khas, menjadi tulang belakang keluarga. Dia menjual keropok untuk rawatan ibunya bernama, Lastri. Pada suatu hari, Mima telah difitnah kerana melakukan kecurian dengan mengambil dompet di dalam kereta.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep74
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Jejak Misteri Ep11
programme.desc: Jejak Misteri ialah sebuah rancangan realiti bergenre misteri di mana setiap episod menyajikan liputan pelbagai tempat, bangunan dan tapak bersejarah yang bukan sahaja menyimpan kisah-kisah bersejarah, malah turut meninggalkan kisah-kisah mistik.

programme.title: Di Sebelah Ada Surga Ep11
programme.desc: Di Sebelah Ada Surga menceritakan tentang 3 pemuda iaitu Andika, Gading, dan Uus. Kehidupan rohaniah mereka dikatakan masih kurang. Masa muda mereka telah diisikan dengan santai tanpa mempedulikan masa depan. Mereka sibuk mengejar keseronokan duniawi yang tipikal dari golongan belia hari ini.

programme.title: Anak Buta Mata Yang Menjadi Satu-Satunya Permata Dalam Keluarga
programme.desc: Mima, anak berkeperluan khas, menjadi tulang belakang keluarga. Dia menjual keropok untuk rawatan ibunya bernama, Lastri. Pada suatu hari, Mima telah difitnah kerana melakukan kecurian dengan mengambil dompet di dalam kereta.

programme.title: Suami Hanya Mau Bersama Saat Suka, Bukan Dalam Susah
programme.desc: Fandy memilih untuk meninggalkan isterinya Hana dan lebih memilih Mila demi kehidupan yang bahagia, daripada tinggal bersama Hana.

programme.title: Aku Istri Tak Pernah Punya Hak Layaknya Seorang Istri
programme.desc: Tergoda dengan kekayaan, Arina akhirnya berkahwin dengan Aldo. Namun, siapa sangka, Aldo bukanlah jejaka yang dibayangkan oleh Arina.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep85
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

Dengan tagline "Be Pop Academy and Be A Super Stars", Pop Academy bertujuan untuk mencari idola baru dalam dunia muzik pop Indonesia.

programme.title: My Tsadis Bos Jauh Di Hati Dekat Di Jodoh
programme.desc: Anak Rei, Devon cukup aktif dan sering membuatkan Rei berasa tertekan dalam menguruskannya. Pada suatu hari, dia berselisih faham dengan seorang wanita bernama Rima, seorang pakar psikologi kanak-kanak. Adakah salah faham ini akan berkembang menjadi cinta?

programme.title: Karnaval SCTV Ep10
programme.desc: SCTV ke-32 tahun menghiburkan rakyat Indonesia. Dalam sambutan ulang tahun SCTV yang ke-32 pada tahun ini, SCTV mempersembahkan pelbagai hiburan yang menyeronokkan dan bermutu tinggi.

programme.title: BUSER Investigasi Ep17
programme.desc: BUSER atau BUru SERgap Investigasi adalah program berita mengenai jenayah yang telah berlaku di Indonesia.

programme.title: Juragan 11 Ep60
programme.desc: Juragan 11 mempersembahkan hiburan dengan sajian komedi segar baharu, yang dimeriahkan oleh bintang tetamu terkenal Indonesia.

programme.title: Commitment
programme.desc: When a North Korean spy infiltrates South Korea as a teenage defector, the South Korean government begin tracking him while his own government sends a vicious assassin to eliminate him.

programme.title: Possessed
programme.desc: Hee-jin returns home from college to find her missing sister. During the investigation, she hears that her sister had been possessed and her neighbors who knew her sister begin dying one by one…

programme.title: Believer
programme.desc: A police detective determined to catch the unseen boss of Asia's biggest drug cartel joins hands with a revenge-thirsty member of the gang.

programme.title: C'Est Si Bon
programme.desc: The story of three young musicians formed a band after a music bar named ‘C’est Si Bon’, where they bicker over their music and find their muse.

programme.title: Emergency Declaration
programme.desc: Mysterious deaths on plane forced the pilot to call for an unconditional emergency landing.

programme.title: My Girlfriend Is An Agent
programme.desc: A secret agent couple goes behind each other’s backs, unknowingly on the same mission to stop a Russian organized crime ring from stealing an advanced bio-chemical weapon.

programme.title: The Closet
programme.desc: After losing his wife, a father tries to start over in a new home with his daughter. But things take a turn when strange noises trickle out of the closet, and his daughter goes missing.

programme.title: Salut D'Amour
programme.desc: Follow the heart-warming tale about a pair of elderly people who, with the support of family and friends, find love despite their failing minds and weakening bodies.

programme.title: Jazzy Misfits
programme.desc: A jazz singer goes on a day trip with her estranged mother in search of her younger sister. The two start to discover a different side to each other as they roam around in Seoul.

programme.title: Gang
programme.desc: Choi Ji-hoon pledges to be the ‘top gangster’ at Daehun High School by joining their underground fight club and fighting his way to the top – no matter the cost.

programme.title: My Sassy Girl
programme.desc: A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.

programme.title: The Goblin
programme.desc: After ten years in jail, Doohyun is released and wants nothing more than to live an ordinary life, but when his old partner kidnaps his daughter, the long-hidden Goblin inside him awakes.

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: A music teacher was asked to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation.

programme.title: Baseball Girl
programme.desc: A young girl is graduating from high school and determined to become the first female player to join a professional baseball in Korea.

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: The competition to see who makes the most arrests heats up between two cops from rival stations when they're forced to work together to catch a criminal.

programme.title: Midnight Runners
programme.desc: Two students from Korean National Police University decide to work together and track down a kidnapping incident.

programme.title: By Quantum Physics: A Nightlife Venture
programme.desc: A nightclub owner, his club manager and a police officer must wash their hands off a drug abuse case that involves high-profile figures, in order to save their own lives.

programme.title: Fabricated City
programme.desc: When an online gamer is framed for a murder, a hacker tries to uncover the truth behind the murder case and help clear his name.

programme.title: Ditto
programme.desc: A voice from the future echoes through an antique radio connects the two living 20 years apart and changed Yong's life forever.

programme.title: The Face Reader
programme.desc: Nae-gyeong is the most skillful face reader in all of Joeson dynasty. After his abilities are acknowledged, he gets pulled into a royal power struggle involving the King's successor.

programme.title: Tazza: One Eyed Jack
programme.desc: A young poker joins a poker team lead by the legendary One-Eyed Jack to pay off his debt, but a single mistake puts the entire team in a life-or-death situation.

programme.title: Possessed
programme.desc: Hee-jin returns home from college to find her missing sister. During the investigation, she hears that her sister had been possessed and her neighbors who knew her sister begin dying one by one…

programme.title: Our School's E.T.
programme.desc: Seong Geun is content with being a P.E teacher, but the school wants to sack him in favor for an English teacher. To survive, he must teach English - but he doesn't speak a word of it.

programme.title: Toxic
programme.desc: Based on a true story, <Toxic> depicts the truth behind millions of mysterious death happened only in Spring.

programme.title: C'Est Si Bon
programme.desc: The story of three young musicians formed a band after a music bar named ‘C’est Si Bon’, where they bicker over their music and find their muse.

programme.title: Marathon
programme.desc: An autistic 20 year-old man with a knack for running goes against all odds and trains for a marathon.

programme.title: The Classified File
programme.desc: A veteran detective and a fortune teller form an unlikely partnership in order to rescue a kidnapped child before it's too late.

programme.title: Ditto
programme.desc: A voice from the future echoes through an antique radio connects the two living 20 years apart and changed Yong's life forever.

programme.title: Recalled
programme.desc: Suffering from memory loss after an accident, Soo-jin begins to see eerie visions of murderous events. She grows suspicious of her husband after seeing a vision of him killing their neighbor…

programme.title: She's On Duty
programme.desc: In order to catch a gangster, a cop goes undercover as a high school girl to get close to the gangster's daughter.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Last 49 Days

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep929930
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45414542
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) (Repeat) Ep1032
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep802803
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep655
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep432
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Young Days No Fears(M) Ep45
programme.desc: The six girls, as good friends, have gone through their difficulties and crises in relationship, at work, and in their marriage together. Despite many challenges in life, they are not afraid. They have got each other’s back.

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Ng Ka Wai is hoping that he will see his loving mother Mui again one day. Mui has apparently been avoiding her son for over a decade while Wai is suffering from depression and panic disorder. When his lost memory suddenly returns, he recalls what he has done to his mother - an unforgivable sin leading to the 10-year separation.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yongzhen (Philip Ng) and Lung Chat (Andy On) are renowned after taking down the Axe Gang, the largest triad gang in Shanghai. Ma is also helped by a kung fu master, the Iron Leader (Sammo Hung), to fight against their enemy. Being defeated, the Axe Gang holds a grudge and kills Lung. Ma, after watching his brother die, decides to take revenge.

programme.title: Defying Chase
programme.desc: A stunt man is inadvertently caught in a criminal operation involving culture relics hustling, and has to fight for himself in a series of dangerous adventures.

programme.title: 3Ft Ball and Souls
programme.desc: Members of an internet suicide room called Life Club decide to end their lives using explosives. But every time the fireworks explode, they find themselves back-in-time before they carried out their plan. They suspect the cause of this mystery to be the young age of one of the members and tries to convince the high school girl to quit…

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriend’s wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge – will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: When Interpol agent Long busted a billion-dollar drug deal 15 years ago, the cartel took revenge and killed his family. The cartel boss, Madame Rose, even kidnaps and raises Long’s daughter, Phoenix, to become a skilled assassin. Only when Phoenix is about to kill Long did she discover the startling fact about her true identity…

programme.title: Cherie
programme.desc: Cherie Chung plays the title character in this sexy romance as a fitness instructor who attracts the attentions of a wealthy businessman and a handsome photographer.

programme.title: The Foreigner
programme.desc: A London businessman whose teenage daughter dies in a terrorist attack is determined to take revenge. His relentless search for the terrorists leads to a conflict with a British government official whose own past may hold the clues to identify the elusive killers.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: In Your Dreams
programme.desc: Heng is a high school student whose mother abandoned the family eight years ago. You Mei is a teacher whose husband is having an affair. When You Mei becomes a temporary teacher at Heng's school, the two lonely souls develop a forbidden love.

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the police’s only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: As Tears Go By
programme.desc: Mobsters Wah and Fly are buddies. Wah loves his cousin, but cannot make their relationship work as he is a mobster. Fly infuriates a mob boss one day and got beaten up badly, implicating Wah too. He then takes up a fatal task to make amends…

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Push and Shove
programme.desc: A puppy gets gravely injured while defending them from the neighbor's large and aggressive Tibetan Mastiff. The arrogant owner of the Tibetan Mastiff, however, refuses to take responsibility, and the police aren't of much help since no people were hurt. When push comes to shove, the puppy’s owner vows to fight for justice for his dog.

programme.title: Justice Sung Sai Kit
programme.desc: An actor who portrayed the famous Justice Sung Sai Kit is sent back in time to the Qing dynasty after he meets a mysterious woman. There, he reprises his role as a lawyer and sets out to protect the poor from the wealthy. However, as time travelling is outlawed, the time-travel police are on the hunt to stop the duo from changing history.

programme.title: Paradox
programme.desc: Hong Kong Police officer Li travels to Thailand to search for his daughter when she disappears mysteriously. He teams up with a local detective to investigate and they chance upon a black market organ smuggling ring which could throw light on his daughter’s whereabouts...

programme.title: The Way We Are
programme.desc: Set in Tin Shui Wai, a marginalised satellite town, Kwai is a middle-aged widow who works hard in a neighbourhood supermarket to support herself and her son. They lead a mundane but fulfilling life. When an elderly woman who lives alone moved in to Tin Shui Wai, Kwai strikes up a friendship with her and helps her ease into a new life.

programme.title: Incredible Monk, Dragon Return, The
programme.desc: Ko Yan Kit is a famous General in Song dynasty. Due to public pressure, Ko dare not confess his feeling for his first love Fung Yee, who is forced to work in a brothel. Feeling helpless, he asks a monk for help. Everything goes smoothly, but when Fung Yee is suddenly killed, the monk must travel to the underworld to save Ko’s first love!

programme.title: Fagara
programme.desc: After her father’s death, a Hong Kong girl discovers she has two hitherto unknown sisters, Branch and Cherry. Through taking up her late father’s hotpot restaurant, she reunites with her sisters by different mothers, and understands her father more from a different perspective, allowing her to finally resolve her long-time hard feelings with him.

programme.title: Young Heroes of Chaotic Times
programme.desc: This story is set in Shanghai in the late Qing Dynasty, and talks about a young man, Chen Zhen, who rises to become a national hero after enduring hardships and overcoming challenges in life.

programme.title: A Wedding Invitation
programme.desc: A boy’s marriage proposal was rejected by the girl and the lovers separated. Nonetheless, they agree on a break-up contract stating that if both are single in five years they will get married. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult
programme.desc: The movie consists of three tales about the horrors lurking in dark corners of the city. A young pop star goes back into depression when spooky things happen in her new home; an online influencer performs live in a mall, but it ends up being a livestream of his death; the residents of a tenement building battle a mysterious figure in the stairwell.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: The Boxer From The Temple
programme.desc: A young monk, The Kid, was expelled from the temple due to his crazy ways. After leaving the temple, he fights a cruel bandit's son and befriends a prostitute. As he fights for justice, his “Crazy Lo Han Fist” improves with every fight.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Chang’s. On the Chang’s farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The "Venoms" were no more. After five years and more than a dozen films together, the only one of the original five who proved so successful for the director was the muscleman Lo Meng. But with just that one "venom" and his incredibly agile new star Cheng Tien-chi, he made this spectacular, internationally popular, favorite. Evil ninjas (who attack with, and from, fire, sun, wood, water, and the ground) brutally slaughter a noble Chinese kung-fu school's students. The one survivor finds a teacher and four students who are ninjitsu experts. The five graduates take revenge. With this strong structure and exceptional kung-fu choreography (from the star and co-star Chu Ke), Chang Cheh produced platinum. This film was one of the director's best of his superheroic, grand guignol period. By any name, it could be called, almost literally, "bloody good" entertainment!

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fiancé. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: Judgement of an Assassin
programme.desc: An evil clan plans a discord so as to dominate the martial arts world. Their masked assassins massacre another clan and one of the assassins is arrested and brought to trial at a tribunal of all the clans. What judgement will they make and can they uncover the truth?

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: Raw Passions
programme.desc: Mrs Lin's husband and his friend both have affairs with a belly dancer Sasa, and are both blackmailed by her. Sasa is stabbed one day and her brother shows up asking for money. A mysterious man also claims he can offer evidence for cash to help Lin’s husband. Lin has to unveil the deceit, double-crosses and blackmailing before she is in danger too!

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, as she is engaged to another man, they are kept apart. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Tao’s real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: Melody of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s “a-go-go” era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: Clan of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxu’s enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: The Kid with the Golden Arm
programme.desc: The government hires Yang to escort a cargo of gold to a famine stricken area. The vicious Chi Sha gang, with one of their best fighters, Golden Arm, announce their intention to hijack it by killing one of Yang's employees. As Yang gathers his own team of reputable fighters to protect his cargo, are they strong enough to hold off Golden Arm?

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his father’s death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the “Toad Stance” and accidentally unveils his true identity…

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: In this horror anthology an old man dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a mortician's ghost goes on the rampage.

programme.title: Pursuit
programme.desc: This movie tells the tale of Lin Chong, the Sung Dynasty’s Chief Army Instructor who is framed by a corrupt official and has to embark on an exile fraught with danger. Helped by a monk, Lin Chong is finally able to take revenge.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zang’s (Ho Fan) journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey (Yueh Hua), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun).

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: A young man is at the wrong place at the wrong time. As he offends a police inspector, he is thrown into jail and even when released, the police goes after him until he has no choice but to become a real criminal. Only a kind and beautiful probation officer is on his side, but can she help him?

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Return of the Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaire’s Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the master’s granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: Tales of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: The White-Browed Priest supports the brutal Qing government, burning down Shaolin Temple and hunting its disciples. Hung from Shaolin falls in love with Fang while escaping from the hunt and the couple have a son before Hung is killed by the Priest. To avenge his father, Hung creates a new form of martial art combining his parents’ kung fu styles.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return…

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: A year before Lo Wei directed Bruce Lee in Fist Of Fury, he wrote and co-starred in this tale of a treacherous devil who wants nothing less than supreme power...and doesn't care if he has to murder the Emperor and use his own daughter as a deadly dupe to get it.

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people’s livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Kodiveeran
programme.desc: Kodiveeran, who enjoys a god-like stature in his village, sets out to protect his family as he battles Villangam and Adhigaaram, who pose a threat to his brother-in-law's life.

programme.title: Anandam Vilayadum Veedu
programme.desc: While Muthupandi and Kaasi, two half-brothers, lead harmonious lives with their large families, their formidable unity is threatened by the evil scheme of an old nemesis.

programme.title: Stalin
programme.desc: The story is about how an ex-army officer brings change in society by making people to help each other.

programme.title: Geethanjali
programme.desc: James, a Hindu orphan, is raised by Lawrence, a Catholic priest. Diana, a rich and arrogant woman, falls for him. Since he loves Julie, he's caught in a dilemma when Lawrence urges him to marry Diana.

programme.title: Kamali From Nadukaveri
programme.desc: Kamali From Nadukkaveri embraces the Power and the Importance of Education for Women. Born as a Girl Child in a village called Nadukkaveri, How Kamali becomes the identity of the same village is what this film is all about.

programme.title: Market Raja Mbbs (3 Hrs)
programme.desc: An arrogant don is possessed by the ghost of a medical college student and turns meek. Now his accomplices expect the return of the actual don.

programme.title: Sivalinga
programme.desc: Raheem gets killed when he tries to save a blind man in a train. When the police close the case stating suicide, Raheem's girlfriend asks Shivalingeshwaran, a CID officer, to investigate the death.

programme.title: Kolamavu Kokila
programme.desc: Kokila, who has financial issues, gets involved in a drug racket to earn quick money. Eventually, her family also gets dragged in the internal drug war which, in turn, puts their lives at risk.

programme.title: Adhe Kangal (Abhishek)
programme.desc: What begins as a love triangle morphs into a thriller, following an accident - and an abduction.

programme.title: Kalathil Santhippom
programme.desc: Ashok and Anand are best friends in spite of being very different. When Ashok accidentally becomes the reason for a misunderstanding in Anand's wedding procedures, he tries to fix it.

programme.title: Gorilla
programme.desc: Jeeva, Sathish, Venkat and Sadhik join hands in order to rob a bank with a chimpanzee as their accomplice. However, things do not go the way they planned.

programme.title: Vantha Rajavathan Varuven
programme.desc: Aadhi promises his grandfather that he will reunite him with his estranged daughter, Nandhini. Posing as a driver, Aadhi enters Nandhini's house but trouble soon follows.

programme.title: Ismart Shankar
programme.desc: Shankar, a contract killer, manages to escape after murdering a politician. Later, he helps the police find a murderer when an officer's memory is transferred to him.

programme.title: Sivalinga
programme.desc: Raheem gets killed when he tries to save a blind man in a train. When the police close the case stating suicide, Raheem's girlfriend asks Shivalingeshwaran, a CID officer, to investigate the death.

programme.title: Kedi Billa Killadi Ranga
programme.desc: The story of two loafing friends, who want to enter politics.

programme.title: V - The Movie
programme.desc: A celebrated police officer's run of success is shockingly interrupted by V, a mysterious killer, who specifically challenges him to end his killing spree.

programme.title: Karnan
programme.desc: Karnan, a fearless village youth, must fight for the rights of the conservative people of his village, due to the torture given by a police officer.

programme.title: Bangalore Naatkal
programme.desc: Three cousins, Arjun, Divya and Kannan, relocate to Bangalore for various reasons. However, they face many challenges which change their lives forever.

programme.title: Yaman
programme.desc: After losing his father to a bunch of scheming politicians, a young man decides to wade into the corrupt and unscrupulous world of politics to avenge his death.

programme.title: Dikkilona
programme.desc: When Mani, a lineworker who is unhappy in his marriage, manages to make a time machine work due to an accident, he goes back in time to change his life.

programme.title: Veetla Visesham
programme.desc: Elango, a 26-year-old man, is shocked to discover that his mother is pregnant. His struggle to come to terms with the news puts his relationship with his girlfriend, Sowmya, in jeopardy.

programme.title: Maamanithan
programme.desc: A humble auto driver, desperate to improve the standard of education for his children, convinces a real estate agent that he will help him sell all his plots.

programme.title: Mersal
programme.desc: Maaran, a doctor and Vettri, a magician come together avenge their father’s death and to expose the corruption that persists in India's medical industry.

programme.title: Irumugan
programme.desc: The film was a box-office success and was dubbed in a couple of languages.The story revolves around Akhilan, an ex-RAW agent who is assigned the task to track down the culprit who is responsible for the attack on Indian Embassy in Malaysia.

programme.title: Paap O Meter Ep49
programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep91
programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep92
programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep93
programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.title: Hagola Ep43
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep45
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep72
programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep22
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep23
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Kicko & Super Speedo Ep28

programme.desc: Trust no one. Deceive everyone. When idealistic CIA agent Roger Ferris (Di Caprio -- The Departed, Blood Diamond) is stationed in Jordan after being wounded in Iraq, he dedicates his life to stopping further attacks by Al Qaeda. Following a plan that the British employed successfully against the Nazis, Ferris plants the suspicion among the terrorists that their leaders are collaborating with the Americans. But as the stakes rise and Ferris finds himself in the crosshairs, the plot he starts spirals into an outcome he could never have foreseen.

programme.desc: Lucy Gets Jack Benny's Account - Looking for new business, Lucy visits Jack Benny in an attempt to get Jack to move his savings from his Beverly Hills home vault to a proposed new vault in the bank.

programme.title: Buffy The Vampire Slayer S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Bewitched, Bothered & Bewildered - When Cordelia breaks up with him on Valentine’s Day, Xander has a witch put a love spell on Cordelia so he can in turn break up with her.

programme.title: The Scarlet Pimpernel Ep01
programme.desc: Part 1 of 2 - During the turmoil of the French Revolution, English aristocrat Percy Blakeney, often aided by his League of friends, secretly undertakes various daring missions as the Scarlet Pimpernel.

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S4 Ep02

programme.desc: Lucy Gets Jack Benny's Account - Looking for new business, Lucy visits Jack Benny in an attempt to get Jack to move his savings from his Beverly Hills home vault to a proposed new vault in the bank.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep07
programme.desc: Wild Boy - Part 2 - Matthew’s life has taken a complete turn, thanks to the love and support of so many people in Walnut Grove, and he is now living happily with Mr. Edwards.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S11 Ep13
programme.desc: Friends and Enemies - One of Potter’s oldest friends, Col. Woody Cooke of I-Corps, is amongst the wounded who arrive at the 4077th. Cooke's wounds are minor but there are a lot of serious casualties amongst his men. When Hawkeye and B.J. make the discovery that the men were injured due to Cooke’s error they break the news to Potter. Potter is angered and refuses to believe them until he investigates the story and finds it is true. When he confronts Cooke about the incident, Cooke asks Potter to cover the whole thing up for him. Potter refuses and loses his oldest friend but he also realizes what good friends he has in Hawkeye and B.J.

programme.title: The Lucy Show S6 Ep04
programme.desc: Little Old Lucy - Mr. Mooney orders Lucy to masquerade as an elderly lady to be the date of Cornelius Heatherington Jr., president of the chain of banks the redhead works for. Problems occur when it turns out the 85 year old bank executive is a swinger and commences to chase the "elderly" Lucy.

programme.title: Remington Steele S1 Ep09

programme.desc: Passion - Angel steps up his torment of Buffy and her friends even as Jenny Calendar searches for a way to restore his soul.

programme.desc: Now You See Him - Columbo matches wits with a nightclub illusionist (Jack Cassidy) suspected of murdering his business associate.

programme.desc: - - Two men born on the same day — but on opposite sides of the financial spectrum — both strive for success in the finance capital of the world.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep03
programme.desc: Welcome To Olesonville - While cleaning out a home in Walnut Grove that she recently purchased, Harriet comes across a bearer’s bond that apparently requires everyone in town to pay her $10,000 each.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep04
programme.desc: Rage - A man named Mr. Stark learns that because of his family’s debt, they will be evicted from their home.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep05
programme.desc: Little Lou - A little person named Lou becomes the single father of a baby girl when his wife dies in childbirth.

programme.desc: Lucy Meets Sheldon Leonard - Popular movie gangster turned TV producer Sheldon Leonard (playing himself) gets permission from Mr. Mooney to film a scene for a TV pilot in the bank after working hours.

programme.title: The Lucy Show S6 Ep01
programme.desc: Lucy Gets Trapped - Anxious to have the day off to attend a department store sale, Lucy feigns a mysterious illness and Mr. Mooney, concerned, sends her home.

programme.title: The Lucy Show S6 Ep02
programme.desc: Lucy Gets Her Diploma - When Mr. Mooney learns that Lucy never received a high school diploma, he explains a newly enforced policy of the bank making it mandatory for every employee to be a high school graduate.

programme.title: The Lucy Show S6 Ep03
programme.desc: Lucy Gets Jack Benny's Account - Looking for new business, Lucy visits Jack Benny in an attempt to get Jack to move his savings from his Beverly Hills home vault to a proposed new vault in the bank.

programme.title: Buffy The Vampire Slayer S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Surprise - On Buffy’s seventeenth birthday she and Angel must prevent Spike and Drusilla from resurrecting The Judge, a demon who has the power to destroy humanity.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit Ep02
programme.desc: Debt - A child abandonment incident prompts the investigation to the disappearance of a mother. They learn that she made a deal with human traffickers to have her daughter smuggled to New York from China.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S6 Ep03
programme.desc: Obscene - An actress is raped while sleeping in her trailer. A producer suspects that the rape was orchestrated as part of a media decency campaign led by a protective mother.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S6 Ep04
programme.desc: Scavenger - The SVU squad races to uncover the clues scattered throughout the city by a taunting copycat serial killer. With the help of his mother, the squad is able to save a survivor of the original crimes.

programme.title: Remington Steele S1 Ep05
programme.desc: Thou Shalt Not Steele - Laura and Remington clash when she wants to provide security for a multi-million dollar painting and he wants to turn down the job because the painting is cursed.

programme.title: Remington Steele S1 Ep06
programme.desc: Steele Belted - Remington is suspicious of a smooth talking attorney who seems more interested in flirting with Laura then in proving his client not guilty of coin theft and murder.

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S3 Ep06
programme.desc: Wedding Bells - When Mrs Slocombe refuses to sell several lines of knickers with dirty slogans, she gets into trouble. However, everyone forgets it when Young Mr Grace hints at marrying Mrs Slocombe.

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S3 Ep07
programme.desc: New Look - Grace Brothers is having a 'suggestion box night'. The staff are invited to bring along their ideas after work and put them to the management. Ultimately the management decides on a suggestion for a new look for the floor.

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S3 Ep08
programme.desc: Shoulder to Shoulder - The staff are informed that the decorators are being called in. The downside is that only one department can be redecorated. Which will it be - and who will be working in the unlucky department?

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S4 Ep01
programme.desc: No Sale - Sales are down, so the management decide to open an hour early. The staff hate the early start. When they take over £100 in the first hour, they concoct a plan to artificially lower the sales figures.

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S4 Ep02
programme.desc: Top Hat and Tails - Young Mr Grace decides that he wants the ladies' and gentlemen's staff combine to enter a ballroom dancing competition.

programme.title: The Jewel In The Crown Ep01
programme.desc: Crossing the River Part I - Daphne Manners arrives in India for the first time and meets Hari Kumar.

programme.title: The Jewel In The Crown Ep02
programme.desc: Crossing the River Part II - Daphne Manners arrives in India for the first time and meets Hari Kumar.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S11 Ep09
programme.desc: Run for the Money - Klinger’s scheme to make a bundle backfires when he makes a racing bet with the 8063rd M*A*S*H unit. Unfortunately for Klinger, his “ringer” world class runner turns out to be the middle-aged, pot-bellied father of the track star. Everyone is sure they will lose their money on the bet until Hawkeye, Hot Lips and B.J. convince Father Mulcahy to run the race. The Father disapproves of the bet but agrees, providing the group will help build a new roof for the orphanage if he wins. They agree and the race is back on. LeMasters from the 8063rd appears to have the race in the bag until Mulcahy tells him about the orphanage, which causes LeMasters to throw the race. Mulcahy surprises everyone when he refuses to cross the finish line unless all of the winnings from the bet are given to the orphanage. They all agree and Mulcahy has two victories.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S11 Ep10
programme.desc: U.N. The Night and the Music - The 4077th receives a visit from three U.N. delegates and global connections are made. Randolph Kent, a physician from England, shares the bond of snobbery with Charles Winchester, while Capt. Rammurti Lal from India shares his knowledge of Yoga with Hawkeye, Potter and Klinger. Hot Lips sparks a romance with Per Johannsen, a Swedish delegate who turns out to be impotent as a result of an old war injury. B.J. has no time for visitors when his patient must lose his leg after gangrene sets in.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S11 Ep11
programme.desc: Strange Bedfellows - Charles’ snoring is keeping Hawkeye and B.J. awake at night. When they try and talk with him about it, he angrily denies being a snorer and refuses to discuss any suggestions. The problem continues until Hawkeye and B.J. expose Charles’ snoring to some select witnesses and Charles can no longer deny the truth. Potter is overjoyed when his son-in-law manages to pull some strings to visit him while he is in Tokyo on business. However, Potter’s happiness fades when he finds out his son-in-law has had affair while in Tokyo. Potter nearly tells his daughter during a late night phone call but instead talks with his son-in-law and tells him of his own infidelity years ago. Both men agree to live and learn with some regrets.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S11 Ep12
programme.desc: Say No More - Lieutenant Curt Collins comes to the 4077th with a leg injury resulting from his heroic actions during a recent battle. A fat embolism takes the young soldier’s life and Hawkeye is left with the unpleasant news of telling the soldier’s father, General Collins. The General react with shock and anger and Hawkeye sees that, for perhaps the first time, the grim reality of war has touched the old soldier. Meanwhile, Hot Lips gets laryngitis and must cancel her plans to meet with a doctor that she has had her heart set on for some time. Charles, while disapproving of her choice in men, does Hot Lips an uncharacteristic good turn by arranging for the doctor to visit her at the 4077th. Hot Lips, already speechless, is also pleasantly surprised.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S11 Ep13
programme.desc: Friends and Enemies - One of Potter’s oldest friends, Col. Woody Cooke of I-Corps, is amongst the wounded who arrive at the 4077th. Cooke's wounds are minor but there are a lot of serious casualties amongst his men. When Hawkeye and B.J. make the discovery that the men were injured due to Cooke’s error they break the news to Potter. Potter is angered and refuses to believe them until he investigates the story and finds it is true. When he confronts Cooke about the incident, Cooke asks Potter to cover the whole thing up for him. Potter refuses and loses his oldest friend but he also realizes what good friends he has in Hawkeye and B.J.

programme.desc: Travellers - Chris discovers the cleverest animal travellers and how they find their way, from deer with mental maps, blue whales planning routes, and dung beetles navigating by the stars.

programme.desc: Refuge - All our animal families make the most of the good times when a new oasis brings untold riches. But they face devastation when a towering inferno takes over. Will anyone survive?

programme.title: Animal Einsteins S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Travellers - Chris discovers the cleverest animal travellers and how they find their way, from deer with mental maps, blue whales planning routes, and dung beetles navigating by the stars.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Discover how engineers built Zaha Hadid's Antwerp Port House, find out how 432 Park Avenue New York was built and marvel at Kengo Kuma's Victoria & Albert Museum in Dundee, Scotland.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Kuala Lumpur to Johor Bahru - In Kuala Lumpur, Michael tries the ancient art of pewter smithing and learns how the discovery of tin transformed a muddy estuary into Malaysia's thriving capital.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S4 Ep5
programme.desc: Northern Predators - Cyril goes to the edge of the Arctic to hear terrifying tales of huge fish ripping apart fishermen's nets. He sets off in pursuit of a legendary giant fish.

programme.desc: Maya Jama - Jason Fox - Foxy from SAS: Who Dares Wins - takes Maya Jama out of her comfort zone for scary physical challenges and some heart-to-heart chat.

programme.title: Earth from Space S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Changing Planet - Cameras in space show that Earth is changing rapidly. Cities sprawl while forests and glaciers shrink. But in Tanzania locals have regenerated the landscape to save chimpanzees.

programme.title: Serengeti S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Inferno - In the second programme, more extraordinary events unfold. In the aftermath of the great fire, our animal characters struggle to survive in an unrecognisable and inhospitable land.

programme.title: Primates S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Family Matters - For primates, family is everything. Complex social lives are key to their success.

programme.title: Deadly Predators S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Predator Power - Steve goes in search of some of the most powerful predators on the planet. At historic Warwick Castle, we meet the stellar sea eagle, the world's heaviest eagle.

programme.title: Deadly Predators S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Super Senses - Steve goes in search of Deadly Predators with the greatest super-senses on earth. From echolocating bats to supersonic whales, and a snake that sees its prey in complete darkness.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Return to the Mara Ep2
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and Safari guide Jean Du Plessis is in the south of the Serengeti plains to witness the largest mass birth on the planet. Every year on the short grass plains, the wildebeest migration stops for weeks while the females give birth. Then the entire herd begins to move again, heading back north towards the Mara River, where crocodiles lie in wait for an annual feast.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of Bugs & Butterflies Ep6
programme.desc: At first glance, the tropical forests of Australia seem empty and still. But look closer and they are packed with life. Few places in the country contain such a high diversity of insects as here. From the canopy to the forest floor, insects cram into every space – and they must fight to survive. In this great battle for life, insects have adopted extraordinary survival strategies: jumping spiders disguise themselves as ants; ants use their larvae as glue-guns to build elaborate tree-top camps; what look like leaves are in fact stick-insects.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Partners Ep3
programme.desc: Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teacher’s pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Out of the Darkness Ep1
programme.desc: Winter releases her iron grip. In Iceland Arctic foxes scurry across mountains to mate. In Shetland an otter raises her cubs. In Norway a vast reindeer herd descends to the calving grounds. A huge March storm rages across the Stormborn lands.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Return of the Light Ep2
programme.desc: Arctic foxes raise cubs on Iceland’s volcanic shores. Finding food proves challenging until one fox learns to hunt new prey. In Shetland the otter cub strikes out alone and his mother finds a new mate. In Norway reindeer calves take their first steps.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Dino Ep7
programme.desc: T-Rex and chickens seem to be as different as they can be, but they more in common that you might think. Recent research reveals that some of our favorite dinosaurs were very birdlike, and that birds are an extant kind of dinosaurs.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Wild Seas Ep5
programme.desc: On the north-east coast of Baffin Island, in Canada’s Arctic, lies Ninginganiq, a blustery wilderness where only the intrepid travel. In fall, it is so dangerous that even seasoned Inuit sailors keep away.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Short Grass Plains Ep1
programme.desc: The Serengeti plains echo the sound of two million wildebeest. Over the course of the year, the giant herd migrates from the north to the south and back again in an endless circle. Watch the most treacherous part of the migration—the crossing of the Mara River.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Return to the Mara Ep2
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and Safari guide Jean Du Plessis is in the south of the Serengeti plains to witness the largest mass birth on the planet. Every year on the short grass plains, the wildebeest migration stops for weeks while the females give birth. Then the entire herd begins to move again, heading back north towards the Mara River, where crocodiles lie in wait for an annual feast.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Wild Seas Ep5
programme.desc: On the north-east coast of Baffin Island, in Canada’s Arctic, lies Ninginganiq, a blustery wilderness where only the intrepid travel. In fall, it is so dangerous that even seasoned Inuit sailors keep away.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - Under Pressure Ep2
programme.desc: As food and water become scarce, Crystal, the fierce leader of the Ruins gang, sets her sights on rival Kati’s territory and its neighboring fruit trees. Watch as Crystal’s move and a raid by outside invaders lead to dire consequences for one troop.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Isle Royale Ep1
programme.desc: Since the 1900s, this uninhabited island in Lake Superior has been a constant battleground between moose and wolves. Scientists have been watching closely since 1953, making it one of the oldest research projects in the country. We go with lead researcher Rolf Peterson as he gets a band of volunteers to scour the island for moose bones, trying to piece together population numbers after a long winter.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Short Grass Plains Ep1
programme.desc: The Serengeti plains echo the sound of two million wildebeest. Over the course of the year, the giant herd migrates from the north to the south and back again in an endless circle. Watch the most treacherous part of the migration—the crossing of the Mara River.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Return to the Mara Ep2
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and Safari guide Jean Du Plessis is in the south of the Serengeti plains to witness the largest mass birth on the planet. Every year on the short grass plains, the wildebeest migration stops for weeks while the females give birth. Then the entire herd begins to move again, heading back north towards the Mara River, where crocodiles lie in wait for an annual feast.
