programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Partners Ep3
programme.desc: Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teacher’s pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Out of the Darkness Ep1
programme.desc: Winter releases her iron grip. In Iceland Arctic foxes scurry across mountains to mate. In Shetland an otter raises her cubs. In Norway a vast reindeer herd descends to the calving grounds. A huge March storm rages across the Stormborn lands.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Return of the Light Ep2
programme.desc: Arctic foxes raise cubs on Iceland’s volcanic shores. Finding food proves challenging until one fox learns to hunt new prey. In Shetland the otter cub strikes out alone and his mother finds a new mate. In Norway reindeer calves take their first steps.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Invaders from the Deep Ep2
programme.desc: As far as invasive species go, Asian carp are some of the nastiest invaders around. They've thus far made their way up America's waterways, snaking up the Illinois river, eating voraciously, breeding quickly, and decimating native fish populations and their food supplies.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - The Goby Effect Ep3
programme.desc: The Lake Erie Watersnake is currently on the brink of extinction, and researchers have been fighting to get it back. And it looks like it's finally working - thanks to the round goby. Grad student Lizzy Mack is heading out on day trips to catch bucket loads of the snakes, collect measurements, and inject them with small microchips to track them along their way, all while dodging bites from some of the crankiest snakes around.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Spring Ep1
programme.desc: It’s spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Summer Ep2
programme.desc: Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: Baboons: Rules of the Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - The Power of Playtime Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brought Back from the Brink Ep1
programme.desc: Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat’s teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - A Koala Called Cavendish Ep2
programme.desc: Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the team’s solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend who’s ready to fly.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spiky and Stinky Ep3
programme.desc: Check out vet Phil’s clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic’s favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who’s the catch of the day.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle Ep4
programme.desc: Join the team’s scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey who’s having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbill’s new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - Arid Heart Ep1
programme.desc: From the vast, dry plains of the interior come some of Australia’s most recognized imagery, such as the monolithic red rock of Uluru and the bounding red kangaroo. But how did the arid center of the continent come to be?

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - The Great Divide Ep2
programme.desc: Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Invaders from the Deep Ep2
programme.desc: As far as invasive species go, Asian carp are some of the nastiest invaders around. They've thus far made their way up America's waterways, snaking up the Illinois river, eating voraciously, breeding quickly, and decimating native fish populations and their food supplies.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 - The Waterberg - Mountains of Life Ep1
programme.desc: In the Limpopo region of South Africa lies an ancient land. From rolling grasslands to rocky gorges, wildlife has learnt to make the most of what’s on offer. This is the Waterberg, a land of plenty.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brought Back from the Brink Ep1
programme.desc: Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat’s teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - Arid Heart Ep1
programme.desc: From the vast, dry plains of the interior come some of Australia’s most recognized imagery, such as the monolithic red rock of Uluru and the bounding red kangaroo. But how did the arid center of the continent come to be?

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - The Great Divide Ep2
programme.desc: Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Bad Reputations Ep4
programme.desc: Where animals and humans co-exist, how do you stop a bad reputation from pushing a species towards extinction? From rattlesnakes to cormorants, see how creatures that have bad reputations are being dealt with when it comes to conservation.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Endangered Species Ep5
programme.desc: With seven of Ontario’s eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow, which means they keep taking a beating from both predators and cars. Can they be saved?

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Autumn Ep3
programme.desc: As fall sweeps across America and trees are set ablaze with color, animals are faced with make-or-break decisions. Find out how bald eagles, beavers, and other creatures prepare for the colder, darker, and leaner months ahead.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Winter Ep4
programme.desc: Winter is the ultimate challenge for wildlife across America. Will they escape to milder southern climates or stay put and tough out the season? See how different creatures respond to the brutal cold and blizzards that blanket the North.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Tide
programme.desc: Low tide exposes a band of shore called the intertidal zone. It’s a place of stunning extremes, attacked by hurricane force waves and exposed to baking heat. Creatures here have evolved in countless bizarre ways. Scientists explore this alien realm.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - Rules of the Game Ep2
programme.desc: Young hyenas compete in tug of war, mischievous parrots play at picking apart tourists’ cars, and Atlantic spotted dolphins enjoy sophisticated social games amid seaweed—all following specific rules that hone social bonds.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Bound By Blood Ep1
programme.desc: The southwest corner of New Zealand’s South Island is hemmed in by giant mountains and the rough Pacific Ocean. Rare penguins are locked in a daily game of cat and mouse with giant New Zealand sea lions. The sea lions also live in a tumultuous world, where pups must battle the elements to survive.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Life in Dark Water Ep2
programme.desc: In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Age of Independence Ep3
programme.desc: The south-eastern coast of New Zealand are some of the richest fishing grounds in the world – the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults. Young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Protectors Ep4
programme.desc: A blind woman has found a new lease on life thanks to her canine running mate, a Jack Russell works as a super-nanny to a surprising array of species, and a team of dogs in Kenya are on daily patrol protecting endangered rhinos from poachers.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Scent Detectives Ep5
programme.desc: A Labrador cross and its partner help prevent ecological disaster in Canada, a Lagotto Romagnolo unearths a rare delicacy in Washington forests, and a Belgian malinois team tracks down the critically endangered geometric tortoise to save the species.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Bad Reputations Ep4
programme.desc: Where animals and humans co-exist, how do you stop a bad reputation from pushing a species towards extinction? From rattlesnakes to cormorants, see how creatures that have bad reputations are being dealt with when it comes to conservation.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (S4) Ep5
programme.desc: Qasr Al Sarab, Abu Dhabi - Surrounded as far as they eye can see by vast sand dunes and scorching heat, guests relax in palatial comfort with swimming pools, huge baths and lush gardens. Giles and Monica explore how all this water use is made possible and meet the staff who are coping with living and providing hotel service in such an extreme environment.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee (S6) Ep4
programme.desc: It's sportswear week and the sewers must create rugby shirts, waterproof onesies for toddlers and tennis outfits.

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show (S30) Ep6
programme.desc: Graham is joined by Paul Mescal, Michaela Coel, Winston Duke, Emma Corrin and Richard Ayoade. Music comes from Loyle Carner.

programme.desc: Belly Flop - The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Dang, I'M Rich! / Power Play - Cousin Ashley sets out to strike it rich and buy himself a mansion. Archibald explores Crackridge during a blackout with a new pal.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep25
programme.desc: Sacks O' Cash / Oh Give Me A Home - Tip and Oh use Slushious as an inter-planetary taxi but Tip takes it too far; Smek becomes homeless and must accept Oh's help.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep25
programme.desc: The Phantom Of Club Moist - King Julien finally realize his childhood dream of opening up a nightclub, only to find it's haunted by a masked phantom.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep25
programme.desc: Norway Out - Odlulu is on the hunt for the Wind Key so she can use it as the world's greatest hair dryer. But the Wind Key is too powerful for Odlulu to handle, so Wally, Wenda and Whitebeard head to Norway to locate the key before Odlulu can find it. Luckily, Whitebeard is a master sailor and can guide the Wanderers through the fjords. Unfortunately, Whitebeard also gets majorly seasick.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep25
programme.desc: Peril Patch / Sibling Quibbling - When a mysterious, dangerous mini-golf course blooms in Troll Village, the Trolls must figure out how to destroy it/Satin's relationship with Chenille is tested when she befriends an extreme sports-loving Troll

programme.title: The Mighty Ones S1 Ep10
programme.desc: The Queen/A Mighty Arm - After a group of ants steal stuff from the Mighty Ones, including Rocksy’s hair, they must head underground to the creepy ant farm in order to confront the Queen Ant to get their stuff back. / When the Mighty Ones accidentally neglect Twig, they make it up to him by embarking on a dangerous adventure to scale a snowman so Twig can live out of his dream of becoming the arm of the Mighty Snow Wizard... which is not actually his dream at all.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Wrinkles & Stickles - After Turtleneck is captured by Frederic Estes, Boss Baby and Tim attempt to rescue her, leading them to the terrifying "fun house" at the town fair

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Taxing Trauma Of The Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep25
programme.desc: Si - Puss fights the Duchess to retrieve the first coin he ever took from the Treasure House, which can help him restore San Lorenzo's protective spell.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep25
programme.desc: Amazamoose And Squirrel Wonder: Chapter Four - In an attempt to reverse Fearless Leader's goop-induced evil powers, Rocky and Bullwinkle travel to an alternate reality to get an "anti-goop." Once there they discover opposite versions of everyone they know from the real world, including a NICE Boris and Natasha!

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep25
programme.desc: Maces And Talons Pt 1 - When they learn the Dragon Hunters are tracking the Flightmare, Hiccup and Astrid race to stop them after Heather spills secrets from Viggo Grimborn

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep25
programme.desc: Best Laid Plans - Team Voltron uses the Black Lion to lure Zarkon into battle

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep25
programme.desc: The Case Of The Torn-Out Pages - Someone's ripped out the final pages of Queen Sparklewings Fairytale book! Who could it be ? Noddy needs to find out fast and restore the pages to the book or the Queen's special fairytale storytelling will be cancelled.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep26
programme.desc: The Case Of The Bird That Can'T Fly - Noddy finds a bird in Pat-Pat's Treehouse that doesn't seem to be able to fly. He decides to investigate: how can they help the bird to fly? Noddy finds out that the bird can fly – it just doesn't want to. But why ?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep27
programme.desc: The Case Of The Clockwork Mouse Mystery - Everyone in Toyland is excited about the first ever Winter Light Festival - except its organiser, Clockwork Mouse who is moving at super fast speed. Noddy investigates why she's acting so strangely. He works out that she's been trying to move at triple speed to get everything sorted in time. Noddy helps her realise that she doesn't have to do all the festival preparations on her own. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep28
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Smartysaurus - For the Night of the Stars, Noddy invites all his friends at home to look at the stars through his telescope. Smartysaurus will bring a map of the stars so everyone can spot them. But when the party starts, Smartysaurus hasn't arrived. Noddy investigates and finds out his big friend couldn't fit through his small front door so she'd shrunk herself! Noddy has to help Smartysaurus get back to her proper size and find a way for everyone to enjoy the Night of the Stars together. Good job, Noddy.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep51
programme.desc: Raa Raa Goes Hunting - Raa Raa has lost his toothbrush and sets off to find it. Where can it be?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep52
programme.desc: The Noisiest House In The Jungle - The animals are exploring what noises each of their houses make… whose house do we think is the noisiest in the whole of the Jingly Jangly Jungle?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep1
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Boomy Thunder - Theres a storm in the Jingly Jangly Jungle but noone is sure what the loud thumps coming from the sky are. Raa Raa sets off to find out.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep2
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Rainy Stick - Raa Raa is intrigued when he hears a whooshy rainy noise but its not raining. Following the sound he discovers Ooo Ooo with a rainy stick his favourite thing

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep25
programme.desc: Home Is Where The Hatch Is - Breeze and Roary swap places for the day (and night). Roary soon discovers the beach is no place for a racing car to live, while Breeze misses the freedom of the beach.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep26
programme.desc: Putting On A Show - The cars are all gleaming for this evening's race. Roary gets bored and heads out onto the track - with disastrous consequences. Will the cars be ready in time for the big show?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep27
programme.desc: Motor Mouth - The track inspector is coming to visit and Big Chris is too tired to commentate on the race. A celebrity commentator is brought in to save the day - much to Big Chris' anger.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep28
programme.desc: Dancing Queen - Christine is due to take part in a dancing competition and is practising at Silver Hatch. But what happens when her dance partner is taken ill?

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep13
programme.desc: Fleshed Out / Messy Business At The Manor - Fleshed Out Wolfie wakes up one morning to every creature's nightmare?he's turned into a human! Messy Business At The Manor When Mosshead has nowhere to go for vacation, Casper invites him to stay at his uncles' house…where he quickly discovers that Mosshead is the world's worst houseguest.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep14
programme.desc: Paramedic Paranormal / Back To Ghoul - Paramedic Paranormal When Jimmy breaks out in hives, Casper and his friends have no choice but to bring him to the human hospital. Back To Ghoul When Casper's uncles Stinky, Fatso and Stretch decide to go back to Scare School, Casper is thrilled.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep9
programme.desc: Turbo Drift - The snails and Tito travel to Tokyo to film a commercial and Turbo is challenged to a drift race against a beautiful and mysterious female cricket.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep9
programme.desc: Sandstorm - The Dinotrux get caught in a powerful sandstorm that stops them in their tracks, which leaves Ty Rux and the Reptools to find a way to save them.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep9
programme.desc: The Strength Of Scotland - Wally, Wenda and Wizard Whitebeard head to Scotland, where Odlulu is using the Strength Key to give her an advantage in the Highland Games. Wenda competes in the games alongside other Wanderers while Wally and Whitebeard try to get the key from an elusive Fritz!

programme.title: The Mighty Ones S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Naked Mole Wrath/Momma Leaf - The Mighty Ones think they are being menaced by a vicious mole rat, but it's a case of mistaken identity. / Leaf discovers eggs stuck to his body and enlists Twig's help so he can be a good momma.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep9
programme.desc: Boots - Jack Sprat steals enchanted boots from the Treasure House and triggers a dangerous Devil Wind that threatens to consume San Lorenzo's treasure.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep9
programme.desc: The Really Really Big Lie - When Julien concocts an elaborate lie, blaming a giant "mega-gecko" for ruining a young lemur's birthday party.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep10
programme.desc: Night Of The Living Croods/Spoonful Of Soo-Gar - When The Croods experience the first-ever sugar-rush, they're hooked on the delicious new food; Grug is labeled a zombie after taking the first nap.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep9
programme.desc: Struck Through The Heart / Boov Up And Drive - Oh has an electric spark when he and Tip do the ultimate best friend handshake./Tip can't get Slushious back until she passes a Boovian Driver's Test.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep9
programme.desc: Big Poppy / Neighbor War - When a troll starts to ruin the fun of open mic night Poppy is forced to enter a compliment battle.Branch tries to drive Sky Toronto away when he moves next door.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep17
programme.desc: The Beast Of The Wasteland - Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep18
programme.desc: Danger In The Forbidden City - Po and the Kids finally arrive in the Forbidden City. After an assassination scare, Xiao enlists Po and the 4Cs for help protecting her during her father's funeral.

programme.title: Trollhunters Ep9
programme.desc: Bittersweet Sixteen - Jim is excited to test-drive a Vespa for his birthday but things quickly go awry when he must fight Bular's flying Vulture Troll sent to hunt him down.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones S1 Ep7

programme.desc: Election - After he’s rescued from a cave, a charismatic old lemur challenges Julien to an election for the throne.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep18
programme.desc: Daddy Julien - King Julien believes Mort is the son he never knew he had – despite the fact that Mort is two years older than him.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep19
programme.desc: Xerx Works - On a mission to destroy the factory that manufactures Octavian’s Xerx warriors, Cleo and Pharaoh Yosira butt heads over who’s in charge and Mihos masquerades as a cabbage.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep20
programme.desc: Parasites - Mihos has some parasites making him sick, and Cleo and the rest have to shrink down tiny to cure him. This one turns out weirder than you’re expecting.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Lucky And The Field Trip Fraud - Lucky is determined to shed her reputation as “teacher’s pet” on the class field trip.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Lucky And The Shaky Day - When an earthquake takes out the railroad bridge, the PALs must find a way to stop the oncoming train – which Jim is aboard

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep18
programme.desc: What Screams May Come/Grunt Anything - Eep joins the Scream-Leading team and starts picking up characteristics of her coach, Meep, much to Ugga's chagrin/Meep kicks Snoot out of the cave for not being a brave hunter. The Croods reluctantly take Snoot in and try to make him into a hunter to get him out of their home.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep19

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep29
programme.desc: The Case Of The Silent Parrot - The Pirate Captain is very worried. Scurvy the parrot isn't saying a word. Without him navigating they won't be able to go treasure hunting anymore! Why is Scurvy so quiet? Is there something wrong? Or is he hiding something? It's up to Noddy to investigate!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep30
programme.desc: The Case Of The Vanished Ninjas - The Ninjas are preparing for an acrobatics show. But after Pat-Pat decorates them with glitter they don't turn up for their rehearsal. Noddy investigates, looking for the Ninjas, but only finds sticky things have gone missing round Toyland - Pat-Pat's glue-stick, the Naughticorns' sticky tape, the Builders' sticky putty. Noddy works out that the glitter made the Ninjas non sticky, so they borrowed sticky things to try and make themselves sticky again. Case closed!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep31
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Suitcase - Pat-Pat is packing for a sleepover at the Palace when her suitcase goes missing. Noddy follows the clues and discovers that the Pockets took the suitcase in order to get Pat-Pat's sleepy pillow. They wanted to keep the pillow because it reminds them of Pat-Pat and they would miss her while she was at the sleepover. Noddy finds the Pockets and the suitcase in the dark, just in time for the sleepover. Queen Sparklewings invites everyone to the sleepover. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep32
programme.desc: The Case Of The Two Parties - The Naughticorns are having a party and naturally they want everyone to come. Trouble is, so are the Pirates. But when no one turns up to either party, Noddy investigates: Why has no one come to either party?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep3
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Jungle Phone - When their jungle phone breaks Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo lose contact and Raa Raa thinks Ooo Ooo doesnt want to be friends any more. Luckily Topsy is able to help them find each other again.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep4
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Zippy Zipwire - Zebby is too scared to go down the zipwire and everyone chanting loudly at her makes matters worse. Raa Raa realises the noise is putting her off and if everyone is quiet it might help Zebby.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep5
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Noisy Story - Topsy wants to tell her friends her favourite story but they interrupt her making lots of noise. Topsy is upset. Raa Raa realises what has happened and goes to make amends.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep6
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Jingly Jangly Jungle Band - Raa Raa becomes the singer in Crockys Jingly Jangly Jungle Band but he gets so carried away with his singing that he forgets a promise.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep29
programme.desc: Homesick Tin Top - Tin Top just can't master corners no matter how hard he tries. The other cars try to help him to no avail… until Roary hits on a brilliant plan.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Legendary Loot - After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Paddington and the Big Decision / Paddington's Beach Stowaway - On the last day of the school holidays Jonathan & Judy can't agree on what to do so Paddington has the casting vote. // The Browns come back from a beach trip with more than sand in their hair - why is that shell moving on its own?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Naughty Tortoise - Dr Hamster's pet tortoise Tiddles gets stuck up a tree - who is going to come to the rescue?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Shop - Peppa and George visit Mr Fox's Shop to buy Granny and Grandpa an anniversary present, but what will they choose?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Shadows - Peppa and George realize that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep140
programme.desc: Hiccups - Froga gets a terrible hiccup, each of her friends come up with creative solutions to help her to get rid of it. No matter how hard they try, though, the hiccups put their patience and good humor to the test!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep141
programme.desc: King for a Day - Today the friends play King For A Day, someone throws the crown on Christopher's head! Then the crown leaves his head and ends on his cousin, Benjy, who just came for a day visit. Benjy only wants to play with his cousin, and do whatever he wants.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Joshini The Amazing - Periwinkle is planning a magic show! The Amazing Joshini and YOU, are eager to perform the greatest magic trick the Blue's Clues house has ever seen! But which one? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art - Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep803
programme.desc: Pups Save a Rubble-Double - Rubble dreams that he's been taken aboard a spaceship and meets his alien double. When the ship crashes on an alien planet, he needs help.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Masked Fishy / The Best Friends Game - When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit. // When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Game Over/Forever Young - Kai invents a new Virtual Reality training game, but Stu and Safia enter the game and want to be the winners! // The Deer Squad must help the city's residents when they break out in spots thanks to Sir Steel's new face cream.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava - Paddington has a new caterpillar friend, and he and Judy learn that not all changes are bad! // The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Paddington the Artist - Mrs. Brown wants Windsor Gardens to artistically express themselves. Paddington doesn't know what art is, so he sets out to find what he's good at!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Campfire Stories - It's a campout under the stars! Blaze, AJ, Starla, Crusher, and Pickle are gathered around the campfire to tell the most amazing stories they can make up! And the best part? Whoever tells the best story wins the last marshmallow!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep624
programme.desc: Superwheels! - Blaze super powers transforming him into... SUPER BLAZE!! And just in time; trouble Bots from outer space land in Axle City and start making a huge mess!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep203
programme.desc: A Tale of Two-más - It's Shipbuilding Day in Larimar and everyone pitches in, except Tomás who'd rather play music. While avoiding work, Tomás meets Pepito, a magic faun who offers to switch places and do his work for him.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Rocky-Bye - Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep607
programme.desc: Robo Puppy! - When a bossy cyborg named the Glitch hacks all the robots in Robotopolis and forces them to dance "The Robot," it's up to Robot Mechanic Molly and Robo Puppy to stop him before it's too late!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep608
programme.desc: The Kingdom of Sleepwell! - All is not well in the normally well-rested Kingdom of Sleepwell: Princess Deema can't fall asleep! Her Royal Court comes to her aid, but when even magic doesn't work, she learns that all she needed to do was follow her bedtime routine!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rongisõit - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Talent Day - It is Talent Day at Peppa's daycare. Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Trip to the Moon - Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep143
programme.desc: The Surprise - They decide to organise a surprise party on the hill. The organisation gets out of hand when Bubu's invitation cards fly away, Ron gets distracted in writing a heartfelt poem and Christopher tries to resist to eat the strawberry pie he baked

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep144
programme.desc: The Paperplane Race - Everyone is bored today, so Bubu organises a paper plane race! Anna, Froga, Ron and Bubu need to create their own special paper planes. To everyone surprise, Froga and Bubu are still in the race.... Who will win?

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: When I Grow Up - A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Let Justice Be done / The Great Spring Clean - Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Into the Blueniverse - It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into Blueniverse. Where in the Blueniverse is Magenta's spaceship? We'll play Blue's Clues to find out!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Dinocoaster - Zeg has a ticket to ride a brand new dinosaur roller coaster: the Dinocoaster! But when the ticket blows away, it’s up to Blaze to help his buddy track it down and get back to the amusement park in time.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Pups Save a Dragon / Pups Save Three Little Pigs - A fantasy fire breathing dragon comes to life and won’t let Ryder and pups into the Lookout! Paw Patrol takes to the Air Patroller! // The Paw Patrol help three little pigs build new houses after theirs mysteriously disappear.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Pups Save a Stinky Flower / Pups Save a Monkey-Naut - Mayor Humdinger drops off a ‘gift’ to Mayor Goodway, a flower that spreads a horrible stink when it blooms. // Mayor Goodway tries to return it to him, but runs into trouble and has to be rescued by the Paw Patrol.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Muffin in space / Fizzy Frenzy - Sir Steel catapults all his old junk into space - but suddenly realises Muffin is in there too! He needs Deer Squad's help to bring her home. // Bobbi's super fizzy drink ends up creating bubbly burpy havoc across Platinum City!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep207
programme.desc: What's up Lola - A bad mood crystal causes Lola and many animals to become unusually grumpy!Jade has to help Deer Squad to restore joy around Central Forest.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Paddington Gets Fit / Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair - It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him! // Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Paddington and the Vegetable Thief / Paddington Takes to the Ice - Who's trying to steal Mr. Curry's prized Giant Pumpkin? PC Wells & Paddington are on the case. // There's an ice rink in the Park & Mr. Gruber teaches Paddington how to skate for the ice disco but will be brave the ice himself again after a fall?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Polly Parrot - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house, and meet their new parrot, Polly.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Peppa and George decide to play a game of hide and seek.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Playgroup - Peppa and George are going to daycare. It's George's first day at daycare, and he shows the class his interest in dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Mummy Pig at Work - Peppa accidentally crashes Mummy Pig's computer, so Daddy Pig tries to fix it.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Don't Yuck My Yum! - In the Gourmet Galaxy, everyone loves yummy food! But when General Yuck turns everything icky, only a recipe for delicious Moon Muffins can stop her. Master Chef Goby and his apprentice Deema must bake those muffins and save the galaxy!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Magenta's Case of the Giggles - Josh and Blue are pretending to be doctors around the house, giving silly checkups to friends, but one 'patient' seems to have a curious condition. We'll play Blue's Clues to help find the cure!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Feelin' Filipino - Lola is missing her hometown in the Philippines, so Josh surprises her by bringing the Philippines to the house! We explore Filipino culture and family traditions as we play Blue's Clues.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S04 Ep405
programme.desc: The Super-Size Prize - At the Axle City Fair, Blaze and AJ realize they don't have enough coins to use the new Supersize Prize Machine. So to earn money, Blaze gets three different jobs, transforming into super-cool vehicles to take care of business.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Finceañera - Lorelai is conflicted when invited to her older sister's birthday party because she's never felt she belonged in Merlandia. When Escarlata threatens to take over, Lorelai must accept her uniqueness as a strength or risk losing everything she loves.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Legendary Loot - After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Paddington and the Big Decision / Paddington's Beach Stowaway - On the last day of the school holidays Jonathan & Judy can't agree on what to do so Paddington has the casting vote. // The Browns come back from a beach trip with more than sand in their hair - why is that shell moving on its own?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Day Off - Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket – and everywhere else she works!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep414
programme.desc: The Secret Club - Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club – going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard - Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep127
programme.desc: Impatient Christopher - Christopher can hardly wait for his birthday tomorrow, he delivers invitations to his friends, he tries to figure out what present they are preparing for him. Christopher learns that sleeping is the fastest way for tomorrow to come sooner!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep128
programme.desc: The Statue of Friendship - Anna is inspired to create a statue of Froga but she runs out of clay. On her search to find more, she and her friends agree to each make their own special statues out of different materials. The best statue to build is one they build together!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Barbabright Has a Secret / Super Duper Cool - Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rainbow Puppy's Skidoo Adventure - Josh and Blue are having a playdate with our friend Rainbow Puppy, who makes everything extra exciting! We play a special game of Rainbow Puppy's Clues to figure out where she wants to go, leaping from skidoo to skidoo and looking for clues.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand - When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Baby Tooth / Slobber Slug - When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down. // A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Tiny Heroes/Big Face in Space - When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in. // The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Paddington & The Tooth Fairy / Paddington Goes to Work - Judy loses a tooth quite literally- Will it be found in time for bed and will the tooth fairy like marmalade? // Paddington becomes a work bear and helps Mr. Brown in the home office but learns computers can be tricky things.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Paddington Becomes a Secret Agent - Mrs. Bird starts acting suspiciously, so the children and Paddington decide to follow her using the spy gadets.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Dino Dash - Blaze and AJ are playing with their friend Zeg when he accidentally gets blasted by a geyser into a far away mud pit. It’s up to Blaze and AJ to save him, using engineering design inspired by their new dinosaur-truck friends.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Piggy 500 - Starla is excited to race with her prize pig Zippy in the Piggy 500! But when her competitor Crusher and his rude pig Slop cheat and send Zippy far away, it’s up to Blaze, AJ, and Starla to get Zippy back to the race in time.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep204
programme.desc: The Trials of the Pirate Protector - On the first anniversary of becoming Pirate Protector, Santiago must complete a series of challenges meant to test his abilities and prove he's worthy all without the help of his tools or best mateys.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Busy Baby - Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep609
programme.desc: The Jaw-some Sharkventure! - Zooli and her crew of Marine Biologists escort their new friends Baby Shark and his pilot fish William to visit Baby Shark's great-great-great-great-great Uncle Slow Mo, and help them escape the determined fisherman who's chasing them!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Mystery On The Guppy Express! - When Oona's Bubble Kitty goes missing aboard the Guppy Express, Detective Nonny steps in to help. Knowing the cat must be on board, they race to find her before the train reaches its next stop--and Bubble Kitty may be lost for good!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep322
programme.desc: Grandpa at the Playground - Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and George to the playground, but does not understand the children's rules.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Piggy in the Middle - Peppa teaches George how to catch a ball, and later, they play Monkey in the Middle with Mummy Pig.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Rock Pools - Granny and Grandpa Pig take Peppa and George to a beach with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. They all have fun with a little crab, a seashell and a fossil. Peppa rescues a little fish in her bucket and puts it back in the sea.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep237
programme.desc: Rebecca Rabbit - Peppa and George are going to Rebecca Rabbit’s house today. It is a bit different to Peppa’s house; it is inside a hill, with tunnels instead of stairs. They enjoy playing rabbits and everyone is surprised when George discovers he likes carrots!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep130
programme.desc: Anna's Horse - Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep146
programme.desc: Funny Sounds - When he accidentally erases the 3 funny sounds that Christopher had on his recorder, Ron, decides to re-record them with the help of all his friends. But no sound seem to suit Christopher, who has a hard time accepting the loss of them.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Grass is Always Greener... - Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Double Dare You / Roy - On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure of Clue Lagoon - Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Knighty Knights - In the kingdom of knight-trucks, Blaze discovers a machine his medieval pals use to recharge. When a dragon snatches the charging station, Blaze leads a quest to recover the machine before everyone in the kingdom runs out of energy and falls asleep.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Pups Save the Polar Bears / A Pup in Sheep's Clothing - Ryder and the pups must fly to the Arctic in the Air Patroller to rescue the lost cubs. // When little lambs keep running away from Farmer Al’s pasture, it’s up to the Paw Patrol to find the missing sheep.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Pups Save a School Bus / Pups Save the Songbirds - When all the tires on the Adventure Bay school bus blow out, Ryder volunteers to use the Paw Patroller as a substitute school bus. // When the famous singing songbirds of Adventure Bay go missing, it's PAW Patrol to the rescue!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Were wig on the the loose / Lights Camera Action - When Sir Steel's high-tech wig malfunctions and goes on the rampage in Platinum City the Deer Squad race to the rescue. // The Deer Squad must think fast to save Lady Fluffpot when Sir Steel's filming turns into a Disaster Movie!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Jump up & get down - It's Deer Squad to the rescue when Stu and Safia bounce off to space on their super bouncy mega trampolines.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure - Join Paddington as he takes off & becomes the world's first Bearonaut thanks to the Brown family! // Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Paddington Opens the City Farm / Paddington the Upcycler - Paddington's excited about the grand opening of the city farm, but the animals escape when the gate is left open - will they find them in time? // Baaz teaches Jonathan & Paddington about upcycling but can the pair create something to earn a reward.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Daddy Loses his Glasses - Daddy Pig is a little upset because he lost his glasses, so Peppa and George try to find them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Gardening - Peppa and George enjoy helping Grandpa Pig plant seeds in his garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Hiccups - George gets hiccups when he drinks his juice too quickly, so Peppa tries to cure him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Bicycles - Daddy Pig has grown a huge pumpkin and Peppa is riding her bike, but says she wants to ride without training wheels. But soon she crashes into the pumpkin.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Puppy Girl and Super Pup! - When supervillain Felina Meow starts turning all the dogs at the annual Dog Show into cats, it's up to superheroes Puppy Girl and Super Pup to stop her! Will they foil her cat-astrophic plan before she turns everyone's pups into kitties?!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep303
programme.desc: No Time Like The Present Store - At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S04 Ep408
programme.desc: T-Rex Trouble - Blaze and Zeg are in Dinosaur Valley, showing off their amazing robot powers to their dinosaur friends. But when they discover three lost little Tyrannosauruses, they must use their robot powers to get the babies home safely.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Bonnie's Mom / The Ocelot's Tale - Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate! // A fun sleepover in Larimar's Museum turns into an adventure when one of the pieces of art comes to life.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Yup Day - Baby convinces Daddy to say 'yup' to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art - Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Paddington's Lucky Day / Paddington the Pizza Chef - Paddington Jonathan & Judy are worried they've used up all of Lucky the dog's luck - how will they tell Sofia? // Baaz's niece Simi is visiting & he wants to create the perfect pizza to surprise her with but it's not easy with hungry animals around!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep508
programme.desc: International Day - Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep509
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Game - Daddy teaches Peppa and George a fun game to play while they wait inside for the rain to stop.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Mummy Rabbit's Bump - Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with some big news-she is pregnant! Will it be one baby or twins?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep142
programme.desc: The Vegetable Pie - Froga's strawberries are sick so she's going to miss this year's vegetable picking. When Bubu offers her a walkie-talkie to use, she agrees to let him baby-sit her sick plant for her. But soon, Froga loses confidence in Bubu's ability to help.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep143
programme.desc: The Surprise - They decide to organise a surprise party on the hill. The organisation gets out of hand when Bubu's invitation cards fly away, Ron gets distracted in writing a heartfelt poem and Christopher tries to resist to eat the strawberry pie he baked

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep90
programme.desc: Noise - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po are trying very hard not to make any noise. Then they make as much noise as possible during the Tubby Phone Dance.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S1) Ep15
programme.desc: Apple - Dee encourages a friend to say apple and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep32
programme.desc: Multi-Story House - One Po loves reading so much, he's walled himself into his home with piles of books. Team Tinpo to the rescue!

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: It's time to visit the farm - JoJo is excited to show Gran Gran around the city farm - it's been a few months since she was last there, and she can't wait to see Melanie the chick again. But where could she be?

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep62
programme.desc: You're Never Too Old - Monty is picked on at school for keeping his cuddly toys, and thinks he may be too old for them. This leads him to think about whether people can ever be too old to play.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep61
programme.desc: Music Power - Monty investigates how music can make people feel different emotions, after Jeanie tells him that music should have that effect.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep3
programme.desc: Featherwand - Bluey and Mum are off to Chloe's party and Bingo isn't invited. But armed with a magic featherwand that makes things incredibly heavy, Bingo can now stop them leaving the house.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep25
programme.desc: The Balloon Badge - Duggee blows up some balloons for Tino the artistic mouse's birthday, but the squirrels are worried because Tino can be grumpy.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep24
programme.desc: The Acorn Badge - Norrie is upset when she sees a leaf fall from the tree, because she thinks it's broken.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep23
programme.desc: The Raindance Badge - When Duggee's flowers look very sad, everyone does a rain dance to help make it rain.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep44
programme.desc: Cave Train Trouble, Slovenia - Glitch has taken Tala on holiday to Slovenia's Postojna Caves, and she is looking forward to finding a rare creature called an olm for her class project. Ubercorn and Lars join them.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep43
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Dream Team Trouble - After Glitch accidentally destroys part of the Academy, he and Ubercorn have a huge argument. When he heads to Grim HQ to make amends, Ubercorn is accidentally trapped.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: Hammerbarn - On a trip to Hammerbarn, Bluey and Bingo create their own mini-homes side-by-side in the trolley. But Bluey quickly gets jealous of her neighbour, Bingo.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: Dance Mode - After Dad eats her last chip, Bingo is given three chances to put Mum and Dad in "Dance Mode" as payback. But the others can't resist taking Bingo's turns for her.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures (S1) Ep30
programme.desc: Andy and the Sea Urchins - Andy blasts off on an aquatic adventure to California to see how kelp forests in the wild deal with urchins. Along the way, he meets a fish called a garibaldi and some sea otters.

programme.title: My Pet and Me: Teeny Tiny Creatures (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Frogs - Ferne learns why frogs are so important to the planet. Rory and Sandy build a garden pond.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S4) Ep23
programme.desc: The Ship's Anchor - We catch up with Captain Sinker on her holiday and see her trying to read a book - a pesky fly soon puts an end to her relaxation!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep22
programme.desc: The Maze Badge - Duggee's workshop needs cleaning, so the squirrels try to help him - but they end up building a maze around Duggee!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep21
programme.desc: The Hiccup Badge - The Squirrels meet a little worm who has swallowed a bit too much earth and has got the hiccups.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep20
programme.desc: The Same Badge - As Peggee and the Hummingbirds journey up the river to deliver a parcel, they have fun spotting and avoiding the wildlife that they meet along the way.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep42
programme.desc: Floating Farms, Bangladesh - Glitch's trip to a funky floating farm becomes a rescue mission on a fast-flowing river.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep41
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Waterspout Wipeout - A race between Xuli, Lars and Glitch gets serious when a tornado hits the Academy Island.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S15) Ep7
programme.desc: Happy Hiro - Thomas sees that Hiro is unhappy so Thomas asks Charlie to tell Hiro a joke, but even Charlie's joke is not enough to make Hiro smile. Later, Thomas meets Hiro at the Search and Rescue Centre, still looking sad.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep25
programme.desc: Donkey Jump - Sarah & Duck try to help Donkey get his jumping confidence back by building a surprise for him in their back garden.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep24
programme.desc: Mars As Moon - Mars tries to fill in for a missing Moon, but needs a little coaching from Sarah & Duck.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep17
programme.desc: Stand Up Comedy - Nelly and Nora try to make the cows stand up, so Dad won't think it's going to rain.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) Ep25
programme.desc: Dog Loves A Book Again - Dog goes back to read the very first book he read - simple picture book. He meets a series of animals who try to help him find the Wumpus.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep60
programme.desc: Caring Sharing Monty - Monty is upset when a friend doesn't return his toy, and decides that he won't lend anything again. He soon realises that this isn't always helpful.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: The Things That Fell Up - Gwen finds a butterfly for her collection, but its colours fade when she takes it away from its friends.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep31
programme.desc: Shshsh!!! - It's Hack-Po's day off and she wants to read her book... if only she can get a bit of "shshsh!!!"

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep32
programme.desc: Multi-Story House - One Po loves reading so much, he's walled himself into his home with piles of books. Team Tinpo to the rescue!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep33
programme.desc: Trampoline - When Dad has to stop having fun with the girls and go to work, Bluey and Bingo scramble to keep him playing games with them on the trampoline!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep19
programme.desc: The Delivery Badge - Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep18
programme.desc: The Eating Badge - The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep17
programme.desc: The Dream Badge - The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep40
programme.desc: Pirate Peril, Jamaica - Xuli dives into action when Glitch's pirate game puts Lars in danger. Yo-ho Go Jetters go!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep39
programme.desc: Funky Fireflies, Selangor River, Malaysia - A trip to see fireflies becomes a rescue when Xuli and Glitch get stuck in a swamp.

programme.desc: Larry Gets The Hiccups - When Larry gets the hiccups, the strange noises he makes causes havoc in the Gorge. Will he have to move away forever?

programme.desc: Dance Mode - After Dad eats her last chip, Bingo is given three chances to put Mum and Dad in "Dance Mode" as payback. But the others can't resist taking Bingo's turns for her.

programme.title: My Pet and Me: Teeny Tiny Creatures (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Frogs - Ferne learns why frogs are so important to the planet. Rory and Sandy build a garden pond.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S4) Ep23

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep20

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep41

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S15) Ep7

programme.title: New Gold Mountain Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Shing finds himself facing danger on two fronts. On the European side, he's been implicated with the woman's murder. On the Chinese side, Shing's status as headman becomes complicated when Lei's intentions are made clear.

programme.title: Girl, Interpreted Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Lillian is forced to take sides when a Chinese grandma and her fengshui is at odds with council by-laws.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - Back Roads heads to one of the country's largest cattle stations, Brunette Downs in the NT. Heather Ewart discovers what makes life on this remote and rugged property so attractive and arrives in time for the Brunette Races.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep5
programme.desc: The daily destination for #auspol addicts. Greg Jennett comes to you from Parliament House with the latest news in politics and national affairs, plus interviews with key players on the issues and events making headlines.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep25
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you comprehensive coverage from our reporters on the ground telling you what's happening and why it matters. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: The Drum Ep10
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's lives everyday, encouraging debate on the topics that matter with a range of viewpoints represented on the panel. Presented by Dan Bourchier.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep25
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Karina Carvalho.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 8 - Heather Ewart travels to Leonora in the goldfields of WA. 800km north-east of Perth, its home to Australia's richest road mile running race and where heptathlete-turned-bobsleigh Winter Olympian Kiara Reddingius was raised.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep25
programme.desc: More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. Our network of reporters uncover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Karina Carvalho.

programme.title: Throwback Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the creators, authors and entertainers who shaped Australia's childhood pop culture. Featuring Jeff Fatt from The Wiggles, Emily Rodda, Tina Matthews, and author of Tomorrow When The War Began John Marsden.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep25
programme.desc: Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and the best coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Manny Tsigas.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep1
programme.desc: Cost of living pressures, interest rates, wage growth, energy prices, inflation, house prices, trade, unemployment, worker and supply chain shortages: Rachel Pupazzoni presents the week in business, finance and economic news.

programme.title: The World Ep25
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: The School That Tried To End Racism Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Hosted by Marc Fennell, this bold three-part series explores a ground-breaking pilot program designed to provide school children aged 9 to 11 with the tools to identify racial bias and make positive change.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep25
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News. We've got more reporters in more places, connecting communities and covering the stories and issues that matter to you. Presented by Michael Tetlow.

programme.title: The Drum Ep10
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's lives everyday, encouraging debate on the topics that matter with a range of viewpoints represented on the panel. Presented by Dan Bourchier.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep25
programme.desc: Follow the story with the latest on the day's events, explaining what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe uncovering what you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep1
programme.desc: Cost of living pressures, interest rates, wage growth, energy prices, inflation, house prices, trade, unemployment, worker and supply chain shortages: Rachel Pupazzoni presents the week in business, finance and economic news.

programme.title: The World Ep25
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Landline Ep14
programme.desc: A look back at some of the best stories gathered by the Landline team in 2022. Shearing the rams the old-fashioned way, high profile kitchen power helping a city farm recover from floods, and the Casella family's mega winery.

programme.title: Girl, Interpreted Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Lillian discovers she couldn't be more wrong for the job when a client's prostate check is derailed by a small language mix-up.

programme.title: Parkinson In Australia Ep31
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Michael Parkinson interviews guests Harry Belafonte and Letta Mbulu.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep25
programme.desc: Sr. 30 - Costa Georgiadis visits a thrifty workspace garden, Sophie Thomson explores pint sized conifers, Clarence Slockee visits an urban farm growing food and jobs and Jane Edmanson explores a diverse native bush garden.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes recap the week's Sydney Sevens rugby tournament with guest Sera Naiqama, an interview with Fijianas captain Rusila Nagasau, table tennis in Tonga, plus music from the Solomon Islands' 'Bibao'.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch Ep1
programme.desc: Michael Rowland, Lisa Millar, Tony Armstrong, Madeleine Morris and Nate Byrne are back with the best conversations with some of the most informed and entertaining guests who have appeared on News Breakfast this week. (Return)

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast: Early Ep5
programme.desc: Start your weekend informed and up-to-date. Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim bring you the latest news, interviews, politics, culture, weather and global affairs. Plus sport with Jared Coote and finance with David Chau.

programme.title: ABC News Ep10

programme.desc: Australian Children's Laureate and author/illustrator Gabrielle Wang delivers the Wang Gungwu Lecture, where we invite prominent Chinese-Australians to speak about their life and work, as part of Lunar New Year celebrations.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Obstetrician Gary and nurse Clare left Sydney for a more peaceful pace in the lush, rolling hills of Nimbin, NSW. But it wasn't just the rural life they were seeking, Gary had long held plans of building a dome-shaped house.

programme.desc: Gandhi’s Legacy - Where is India Headed? - Part 2 - Mahatma Gandhi was assassinated on the 30 of January, 1948 - his murderer a Hindu fanatic. What remains of those ambitions, today?

programme.desc: In the Edo period, childbirth was a community affair, with the mother-to-be attended by a midwife and the women in her life. It was also characterized by unique customs and superstitions.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: Japan's first surgical robot was recently approved for use on stomach and other cancers. Through interviews with the developers, we examine how it is changing the future of surgery.

programme.title: Exploring The Lands Of The Ainu
programme.desc: Episode 4: Chitose Introducing the Ainu peoples' traditional "Acircepnomi" ceremony held in Chitose City. This "Acircepnomi" means "To offer and thank the Kamuy for new salmon" in the Ainu language.

programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.desc: Reporting the latest business, finance and economic news, with added analysis from studio guests.

programme.title: Today'S Close-Up
programme.desc: Recent discoveries suggesting the existence of water on the Moon have raised the possibility of lunar settlements within 20 years. We look at some Japanese firms taking part in the new space race.

programme.title: Asia Insight
programme.desc: Thailand's elderly population is exploding, but many seniors find themselves socially isolated. Meet the students attending "senior school," a new initiative to encourage social integration.

programme.desc: Reporting the latest business, finance and economic news, with added analysis from studio guests.

programme.title: Bento Expo Shimane Special
programme.desc: Today: a special episode focusing on Shimane Prefecture. We meet local bento makers from Germany, Bangladesh, and Brazil. Marc and Maki make dishes with a Shimane specialty: snow crab.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: In Japan cheap plastic umbrellas aren't given much thought. But by applying pressure to layers of plastic from old umbrellas, Saito Aki has made beautiful fabric and a hit line of handbags.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Japan Sportscope
programme.desc: Harry's challenge this time is "Slack Line" that originated from tightrope walking. They compete in aesthetics and creativity on a resilient belt-like line 5cm wide and 15m long.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Japan
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan presents a variety of short programs focusing on Japan and Asia.

programme.title: Japan From Above: Up Close
programme.desc: This program takes you on an aerial journey across 21st century Japan. Enjoy the bird's-eye view of unique landscapes as well as intimate portraits of the people who inhabit the archipelago.

programme.title: J-Arena
programme.desc: Running, jumping and climbing combine to create the artistic, fluid sport of Parkour. We introduce Izumi Hikari and Suzuki Tomoya, who both competed at the recent Parkour World Championships.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Cycle Around Japan
programme.desc: Our rider travels in Shimane Prefecture in western Japan and comes across unique locals like a clam fisherman and a blacksmith. He also experiences a traditional form of dance called Kagura.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: The Red Way
programme.desc: Xi Jinping entered an unprecedented third term as General Secretary of the Communist Party of China. We visit a regional Communist Party school to find the roots of his support among Party members.

programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Train Cruise
programme.desc: Journey through the snowy landscapes of northern Fukui Prefecture in central Japan on the Echizen Railway. Practice zazen meditation at Eiheiji, sip locally brewed sake, and dine on Echizen crab.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at rice cultivation. It takes a lot of hard work to produce Japan's delicious staple food.

programme.title: Today'S Close-Up
programme.desc: Recent discoveries suggesting the existence of water on the Moon have raised the possibility of lunar settlements within 20 years. We look at some Japanese firms taking part in the new space race.

programme.title: The Signs
programme.desc: Opportunities to wear kimono are becoming fewer and fewer in modern Japan. But a new trend is emerging to bring them to a wider audience by transcending barriers of physical ability and sexuality.

programme.title: Danko & Danta: Robot Danta
programme.desc: Cardboard girl Danko, her friend Danta, and craft master Mr. Snips team up to make toys out of cardboard. In this episode, they make a robot version of her friend Danta!

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Yokai
programme.desc: In Japan, strange phenomena are said to be the work of creatures known as yokai. Their legends are still told in regions all over the country. This episode introduces the tale of the Zashiki Warashi.

programme.title: The Quest For Ancient Color
programme.desc: Japan's Classical period featured stunning natural colors and dyeing techniques. A fifth-generation Kyoto dye craftsman is rediscovering this tradition, resulting in a rich expression of hues.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Kyokusui-no-Utage, poetry with classic Heian elegance. Dive deep into the beauty of the ancient capital, still innovative 1,200 years after its foundation.

programme.desc: The fascinating stories and secrets behind hit Japanese products, plus parts and machines that boast the top share of niche markets. This time: fish finders & medical simulators.

programme.title: Bosai: Pm2.5
programme.desc: Have you ever heard of PM2.5? These extremely small particles floating in the air can have an adverse effect on the human body. In this episode, we'll look at their dangers and countermeasures.

programme.desc: There are hidden rules and unique ways of thinking that we can discover in our daily lives. With anime, songs, exercises, and Pythagora tools, get ready for fun! This time "The Beaver Dam"...

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Lewis vs. Spivac
programme.desc: Prelims - After quietly working his way up the heavyweight ranks, Moldova’s Serghei Spivac smashed his way into the Top 15 with finishes of Greg Hardy and Augusto Sakai, and now the “Polar Bear” aims for even greater heights when he faces the UFC’s Knockout King, Derrick Lewis, in the main event of UFC Fight Night on February 5 at the APEX in Las Vegas. One of the best heavyweights of his era, Lewis has sent top prospects like Chris Daukaus and Curtis Blaydes crashing to defeat, and he has similar plans for Spivac in this pivotal showdown
